task: Accept or reject changes in a document
steps: 1. To accept changes one at a time, select Accept.
2. To accept all changes, select the drop-down arrow under Accept and select Accept All Changes.
3. To reject changes one at a time, select Reject.
4. To reject all changes, select the drop-down arrow under Reject and select Reject All Changes.
5. To skip a change or go back to a change, select Previous or Next.
